sentence_1: Wikipedia is such a source of knowledge which has been compiled in partnership with its own readers.
sentence_2: This is free wiki website, which means anyone can make a change in the page of any article by clicking on the link "Edit the page"
sentence_3: If you like any article you can express your express your views on the discussion page.
sentence_4: First click on the link of "Comments page" and then click on "Edit the page" link there.
sentence_5: I always feel happy reading your comments.
sentence_6: If you want to see a new article that we do not have, add it in the list of requested articles.
sentence_7: Islamic Republic of Pakistan is located in South Asia.
sentence_8: In the east of Pakistan there is India, China in north east, Afghanistan and Iran in west and Arabic sea in south.
sentence_9: Pakistan means a place of living for sacred people and this name was suggested by Chaudhary Rehmat Ali in 1933.
sentence_10: In 711 Mohammed Bin Qasim conquered a part of sub continent(present Pakistan and India) in the reign of Amwi Khalifa Waleed bin Abdul Malik  and in this way sub continent( Present Pakistan) became a part of largest state of Arab whose capital was Damascus, language was Arabic and religion was Islam.
